TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerator

summary.span: 支持对非泛型集合的简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a non-generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是所有非泛型枚举器的基接口。 is the base interface for all non-generic enumerators. 有关此接口的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this interface see . C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，使用`foreach`建议而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 方法提供的 COM 互操作性和不需要完全实现; 相反，实施者可以引发。The method is provided for COM interoperability and does not need to be fully implemented; instead, the implementer can throw a . 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素; 否则为是不确定的。You must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of ; otherwise, is undefined. 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，则调用引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要设置再次集合的第一个元素，可以调用，如果它实现后, 跟。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call , if it’s implemented, followed by . 如果是未实现，你必须创建新的枚举器实例，以返回到集合的第一个元素。If is not implemented, you must create a new enumerator instance to return to the first element of the collection. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之间修改集合和，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现和为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the and interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，不显式调用这些接口的成员，但它们并实现以支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 以循环访问集合。In this example, members of these interfaces are not explicitly called, but they are implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Current { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: Gets the element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 集合中位于枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未定义任何以下条件下： is undefined under any of the following conditions: - 枚举器创建后立即，枚举数定位在集合中，第一个元素之前。The enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection, immediately after the enumerator is created. 必须调用来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . - 上次调用返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. - 由于在集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素所做的更改，枚举数将失效。The enumerator is invalidated due to changes made in the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements. 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但其实现支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数推进到集合的下一个元素。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: 如果枚举数已成功地推进到下一个元素，则为 ；如果枚举数传递到集合的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个枚举器或方法被调用时，枚举数定位在集合中，并且首次调用的第一个元素之前方法将枚举器移到集合的第一个元素上。After an enumerator is created or after the method is called, an enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to the method moves the enumerator over the first element of the collection. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`直到调用。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false` until is called. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但其实现支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#2)]

exception.span: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

span.span: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个元素之前。

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或方法抛出异常。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to the or method throws an . 方法提供的 COM 互操作性。The method is provided for COM interoperability. 它不一定需要实现;相反，实施者可以只引发。It does not necessarily need to be implemented; instead, the implementer can simply throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但其实现支持使用`foreach`(`for each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`for each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#2)]

exception.span: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

span.span: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

para.span: 对所有调用枚举器，必须将它们产生同样的状态。

span.span: All calls to must result in the same state for the enumerator.

para.span: 首选的实现是将枚举器移动到集合的第一个元素之前的开头。

span.span: The preferred implementation is to move the enumerator to the beginning of the collection, before the first element.

para.span: 这使枚举数，如果集合已修改，枚举数自创建以来，这是与一致和。

span.span: This invalidates the enumerator if the collection has been modified since the enumerator was created, which is consistent with and .
